relation.text: 21 June 89 I was quite ashamed of the Letter which I wrote
nephew to Lord Gage & great interest was now
had educated , which was very beautiful She is now
spoke with great affection of Dr. Stonehouse who now
a visit to Dr. Stonehouse -- Monday
respected by all the World -- I am now
Spent the day at home -- our Madcaps who have been at Bristol for a few days
